view
Class Batonnet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  view.Batonnet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatonnetEnCouleur, BatonnetEnGris
public class Batonnet
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer

Batonnet est la classe permettant l'observer pour les différentes classes qui en hérite BatonnetEnCouleur et BatonnetEnGris

Version:
2
Author:
Jeremie Samson & Victor Paumier
See Also:
Serialized Form
